instructions: Arrange a steamer basket in a pot over boiling water, and steam the green beans 3 to 4 minutes.
In a bowl, mix the soy sauce, garlic, garlic chili sauce, and honey.
Heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the green beans, and fry for 3 to 5 minutes.
Pour in the soy sauce mixture.
Continue cooking and stirring 2 minutes, or until the liquid is nearly evaporated.
title: Sweet and Spicy Green Beans
steps: Arrange a steamer basket in a pot over boiling water, and steam the green beans 3 to 4 minutes.
In a bowl, mix the soy sauce, garlic, garlic chili sauce, and honey.

Heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the green beans, and fry for 3 to 5 minutes. Pour in the soy sauce mixture. Continue cooking and stirring 2 minutes, or until the liquid is nearly evaporated. Serve immediately.
